snippet: The stampede, during a religious commemoration, took place outside a mosque in the Ningxia region, an area dominated by members of the Hui ethnic group, Xinhua reported.
lead_paragraph: The stampede, during a religious commemoration, took place outside a mosque in the Ningxia region, an area dominated by members of the Hui ethnic group, Xinhua reported.

headline.main: 14 Killed in Stampede in Northwest China
